scripts.build: cd ../../../ && npm run build:dist && npx cordova build android
scripts.run-emulator: cd ../../../ && npm run build:dist && npx cordova emulate android --target=Nexus_4_API_22
scripts.run-device: cd ../../../ && npm run build:dist && npx cordova run android -device
scripts.add-platform: cd ../../../ && npx cordova platform add android
scripts.rm-platform: cd ../../../ && npx cordova platform rm android
